title: Hooked on Canadian Books: The Good, the Better, and the Best Canadian Novels since 1984
description: Having been a contributing reviewer for The Globe and Mail for more than twenty years, T.F. Rigelhof knows good literature. This conversational survey of the novels published since 1984 presents his readings of well-known Canadian writers while bringing the work of newer and lesser-known voices to more deserving attention.
author: T.F. Rigelhof
